scripts.dev: cross-env Z_ORIGIN="http://localhost:9888" concurrently "yarn workspace bear-server dev" "yarn workspace zoo-web dev --port 9000"
scripts.dev:zebra: concurrently "yarn workspace zebra-server dev" "yarn workspace zebra-web dev"
scripts.dev:aardvark: cross-env Z_ORIGIN="http://localhost:3988" concurrently "yarn workspace aardvark-server dev" "yarn workspace zoo-web dev"
scripts.dev:mobile: watchman watch-del-all && yarn workspace zoo-mobile start
scripts.dev:ios:xcode: yarn workspace zoo-mobile prebuild && open apps/zoo-mobile/ios/Zerve.xcworkspace
scripts.dev:sync: yarn workspace @zerve/cli build && yarn workspace demo-web sync && yarn workspace demo-mobile sync
scripts.zerve-sync: yarn workspace @zerve/cli build && yarn workspace demo-web sync && yarn workspace demo-mobile sync
scripts.aardvark:build: yarn workspace aardvark-server build && yarn workspace zoo-web build
scripts.aardvark:start: cross-env Z_ORIGIN="http://localhost:3988" concurrently "yarn workspace aardvark-server start" "yarn workspace zoo-web start"
scripts.z:web: yarn build && yarn workspace zapp dev
scripts.z:next: yarn build && yarn workspace next-app dev
scripts.z:web:db:push: yarn workspace zapp prisma db push
scripts.z:web:build: yarn build && yarn workspace zapp build
scripts.z:build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app --exclude zapp -pi run build
scripts.z:upgrade:tamagui: manypkg upgrade tamagui && manypkg upgrade @tamagui && manypkg upgrade tamagui-loader
